titles.title: Tax Relief for Transportation Workers Act of 2008
Tax Relief for Transportation Workers Act of 2008
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide tax relief for obtaining transportation worker identification credentials.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Tax Relief for Transportation Workers Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow: (1) individuals a refundable tax credit for the qualified expenses incurred in obtaining a transportation worker identification credential; and (2) employers a deduction equal to 40% of the aggregate qualified expenses paid or incurred in obtaining such credentials on behalf of their employees.
